remarks.para: Three different methods are provided to render an notification message from different content. See .

summary.para: Render a HTML notification message from a file, a URL or a text chunk.

The source type of the notification.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void ShowSvgNotification (string source, string header, string body, int width, int height, int timeout);

Docs.summary: Renders an Svg message from a file or an Svg chunk.
Docs.param: The source of the Svg notification. A file or a text chunk.
The header that will replace @HEADER@ if found.
The body that will replace the @LINE@ macros.
The width of the message bubble.
The height of the message bubble.

remarks.para: If the Svg file contains macros, they will be replaced with the contents of header and body parameters.

item.description: replaced with the contents of the header parameter
replaced with the contents of the body parameter

Docs.summary: Renders a standard notification message included in the framework assembly specifying the width, the height and the timeout of the notification.
Docs.param: The width of the notification bubble.
The height of the notification bubble.
The type of the notification. It can be Warning, Info or Error.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void ShowMessageNotification (string header, string body, Chicken.Gnome.Notification.NotificationType type);

Docs.summary: Renders a standard notification message included in the framework assembly.

param.name: body
param.para: The body of the message. A maximum of 3 lines will be rendered. Each line of the body must be separated with %%.
Example: "this is a three %% line %% message body"

Docs.param: Can be Warning, Info and Error.
